00040 #ifndef _uitextbutton_cpp
00041 #define _uitextbutton_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "uitextbutton.h"
00044 #include "uilayer.h"
00045 #include "uimanager.h"
00046 #include "internalGorilla.h.cpp"
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     namespace UI
00051     {
00052         TextButton::TextButton(String& name, Vector2 Position, Vector2 Size, Whole Glyph, String Text, UILayer* Layer)
00053             : Button(name,Position,Size,Layer)
00054         {
00055             IsText = true;
00056             GorillaButton = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createCaption(Glyph,GorillaRectangle->left(),GorillaRectangle->top(),Text);
00057             GorillaButton->size(GorillaRectangle->width(),GorillaRectangle->height());
00058             GorillaButton->background(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0,0));
00059         }
00060 
00061         TextButton::~TextButton()
00062         {
00063             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyCaption(GorillaButton);
00064         }
00065 
00066         void TextButton::SetText(String& Text)
00067         {
00068             GorillaButton->text(Text);
00069         }
00070 
00071         String TextButton::GetText()
00072         {
00073             return GorillaButton->text();
00074         }
00075 
00076         void TextButton::HorizontallyAlign(UI::TextHorizontalAlign Align)
00077         {
00078             Gorilla::TextAlignment HA;
00079             switch (Align)
00080             {
00081                 case UI::Left:
00082                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Left;
00083                     break;
00084                 case UI::Right:
00085                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Right;
00086                     break;
00087                 case UI::Middle:
00088                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre;
00089                     break;
00090                 default:
00091                     return;
00092             }
00093             GorillaButton->align(HA);
00094         }
00095 
00096         void TextButton::VerticallyAlign(UI::TextVerticalAlign Align)
00097         {
00098             Gorilla::VerticalAlignment VA;
00099             switch (Align)
00100             {
00101                 case UI::Top:
00102                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Top;
00103                     break;
00104                 case UI::Bottom:
00105                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Bottom;
00106                     break;
00107                 case UI::Center:
00108                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle;
00109                     break;
00110                 default:
00111                     return;
00112             }
00113             GorillaButton->vertical_align(VA);
00114         }
00115 
00116         void TextButton::SetPosition(Vector2 Position)
00117         {
00118             RelPosition = Position;
00119             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00120             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00121             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00122             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00123             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00124         }
00125 
00126         Vector2 TextButton::GetPosition()
00127         {
00128             return RelPosition;
00129         }
00130 
00131         void TextButton::SetActualPosition(Vector2 Position)
00132         {
00133             GorillaButton->left(Position.X);
00134             GorillaButton->top(Position.Y);
00135             GorillaRectangle->left(Position.X);
00136             GorillaRectangle->top(Position.Y);
00137         }
00138 
00139         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualPosition()
00140         {
00141             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->left(), GorillaButton->top());
00142             return Pos;
00143         }
00144 
00145         void TextButton::SetSize(Vector2 Size)
00146         {
00147             RelSize = Size;
00148             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00149             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00150             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00151             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00152             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00153         }
00154 
00155         Vector2 TextButton::GetSize()
00156         {
00157             return RelSize;
00158         }
00159 
00160         void TextButton::SetActualSize(Vector2 Size)
00161         {
00162             GorillaButton->width(Size.X);
00163             GorillaButton->height(Size.Y);
00164             GorillaRectangle->width(Size.X);
00165             GorillaRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00166         }
00167 
00168         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualSize()
00169         {
00170             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->width(), GorillaButton->height());
00171             return Pos;
00172         }
00173 
00174         void TextButton::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00175         {
00176             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00177             switch(Priority)
00178             {
00179                 case UI::RP_Low:
00180                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00181                     break;
00182                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00183                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00184                     break;
00185                 case UI::RP_High:
00186                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00187                     break;
00188                 default:
00189                     break;
00190             }
00191             GorillaButton->RenderPriority(RP);
00192             GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00193         }
00194 
00195         UI::RenderPriority TextButton::GetRenderPriority()
00196         {
00197             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority();
00198             switch(RP)
00199             {
00200                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00201                     return UI::RP_Low;
00202                     break;
00203                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00204                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00205                     break;
00206                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00207                     return UI::RP_High;
00208                     break;
00209                 default:
00210                     break;
00211             }
00212             return UI::RP_Medium;
00213         }
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 #endif
